title: Weak Q2, concerns over asset quality drag private banks
description: Kotak Mahindra Bank dived 4.7% and RBL Bank plunged 13.8%. HDFC Bank shares advanced 2.6%, emerging as sole gainer in Bank Nifty index, which shed 0.3%. Benchmark Nifty ended 0.3% lower at 24,781 in choppy trades.
excerpt: Business News- Read Latest Financial news, Stock/Share Market News, Economy News, Business News on The Economic Times. Find IPO Analysis, Mutual Funds Trends & Analysis, Gold Rate, Real Estate & more.
